title: Havoc
description: havoc/ˈhavək/verbARCHAIC1. lay waste to; devastate.He sent me away to be killed.But I outsmarted him, and now his allies are mine.It’s time to claim my rightful place as head of the crime family. But his closest associates stand in my way. Try and take it from me...We’ll see who’s still standing at the end.
author: Kate Bonham
